name: Bing Clarity
description: Following on from my Google Clarity style, here is a version for Bing. This style makes the info on Bing easier to see at a glance. The most noticeable change is regarding the result titles, which have a bluish-grey box around them. Image results (the title in main results) has green box and news results has yellow box. Knowledge graph is light-ish grey, which I will probably change to a light cream yellow soon. Notices about cookies and privacy warnings are hidden.
